subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dirk Nowitzki scored 10 of his 24 points in the fourth quarter Thursday night as the Mavericks slipped by the visiting Cavaliers, 95-92, for their franchise record-tying 14th consecutive victory.
snippet: Dirk Nowitzki scored 10 of his 24 points in the fourth quarter Thursday night as the Mavericks slipped by the visiting Cavaliers, 95-92, for their franchise record-tying 14th consecutive victory.
